name: Swipe the Awesome Arrows - Impossible & Addicting Brain Test Games
name_original: Swipe the Awesome Arrows - Impossible & Addicting Brain Test Games
description:
Test your focus with this easy to pick up, yet difficult to master arrow swiping game.

Swipe the solid arrows in the correct direction, and the zebra arrows in the opposite direction. Sounds easy, but it gets tricky quick ;)

Also, you can challenge yourself with 3 different game play modes!

Features:
- Hours of swiping excitement
- Easy to pick up
- Challenging
- Highly addictive
- Good for a quick fix
- Endless game play
- Game center
- 3 challenging game modes

** Search "Tardent" on the App Store for more great apps and games.
